category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
I feel like it's heaven on earth to please You,
and to be the person You want me to be.
I wish I was holy like You are holy,
pure like Christ is pure,
perfect like Your Spirit is perfect!

These feel like the best commands in the whole Bible,
so why do I keep breaking them?
Do I have to break them?
Is it impossible to stop as long as I'm alive?

It's awful that I'm a sinner,
that I grieve this amazing God,
who is infinitely good and gracious!
If You would just punish me for my sins, it wouldn't hurt so much to offend You.
But even though I sin constantly,
You just keep being kind to me.

Sometimes I feel like I could handle any kind of suffering,
but how can I stand to dishonor this glorious God?
What can I do to glorify and worship this best of all beings?

I wish I could dedicate my soul and body to His service,
completely and forever.
I wish I could give myself up to Him,
and never again try to be in charge of my own life,
or have any will or desires
that don't perfectly match His will and His love.

But the sad truth is, I can't seem to live without sinning.

May the angels glorify Him non-stop,
and if it's possible, bow even lower
before the blessed King of heaven.
I long to join them in that endless praise.
But even if I do everything I can for all of eternity,
I won't be able to offer more than a tiny piece
of the worship that the glorious God deserves.

Please, give me a heart full of divine, heavenly love.
